''[[VMware ThinApp]]'' is a virtualization suite capable of creating portable software ("[[portable apps]]")
''[[VMware ThinApp]]'' is a virtualization suite capable of creating portable software ("[[portable apps]]")
  +   +
''[http://www.vmware.com/go/vsphere VMware vSphere]''
The ''[[VMware Tools]]'' package adds drivers and utilities to improve the graphical performance for different guest operating systems, including mouse tracking. The package also enables some integration between the guest and host systems, including shared [[directory (file systems)|folder]]s, [[plug-and-play]] devices, [[clock]] [[synchronisation]], and [[Cut, copy, and paste|cutting-and-pasting]] across environments. VMware Inc makes VMware Tools available for [[Microsoft Windows]], [[Linux]], [[Solaris (operating system)|Sun Solaris]], [[FreeBSD]], and [[Novell NetWare]] guest systems.<ref>{{ cite web | url = http://www.vmware.com/pdf/ws6_manual.pdf | title = Installing and Upgrading VMware Tools | work = Workstation Userâs Manual | publisher = VMware, Inc. | accessdate = 2007-11-02 | date = [[2007-09-20]] }}</ref>
The ''[[VMware Tools]]'' package adds drivers and utilities to improve the graphical performance for different guest operating systems, including mouse tracking. The package also enables some integration between the guest and host systems, including shared [[directory (file systems)|folder]]s, [[plug-and-play]] devices, [[clock]] [[synchronisation]], and [[Cut, copy, and paste|cutting-and-pasting]] across environments. VMware Inc makes VMware Tools available for [[Microsoft Windows]], [[Linux]], [[Solaris (operating system)|Sun Solaris]], [[FreeBSD]], and [[Novell NetWare]] guest systems.<ref>{{ cite web | url = http://www.vmware.com/pdf/ws6_manual.pdf | title = Installing and Upgrading VMware Tools | work = Workstation Userâs Manual | publisher = VMware, Inc. | accessdate = 2007-11-02 | date = [[2007-09-20]] }}</ref>
